00008 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_New(int recordsPerPage)
00009 {
00010     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider = (EaglePageProvider*) malloc(sizeof(EaglePageProvider));
00011     
00012     pageProvider->recordsPerPage = recordsPerPage;
00013     pageProvider->offsetRecords = 0;
00014     pageProvider->totalRecords = 0;
00015     pageProvider->records = NULL;
00016     pageProvider->nextPage = EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromStream_;
00017     pageProvider->pagesRemaining = EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromStream_;
00018     pageProvider->obj = NULL;
00019     pageProvider->nextPageLock = EagleSynchronizer_CreateLock();
00020     
00021     return pageProvider;
00022 }
00023 
00024 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_CreateFromIntStream(int *records, int totalRecords, int recordsPerPage)
00025 {
00026     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider = EaglePageProvider_New(recordsPerPage);
00027     
00028     pageProvider->records = records;
00029     pageProvider->totalRecords = totalRecords;
00030     
00031     return pageProvider;
00032 }
00033 
00040 EaglePageProvider* EaglePageProvider_CreateFromInt(int value, int recordsPerPage)
00041 {
00042     int *data = (int*) calloc((size_t) recordsPerPage, sizeof(int)), i;
00043     EaglePageProvider *pageProvider = EaglePageProvider_CreateFromIntStream(data, recordsPerPage, recordsPerPage);
00044     for(i = 0; i < recordsPerPage; ++i) {
00045         data[i] = value;
00046     }
00047     return pageProvider;
00048 }
00049 
00050 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemaining(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00051 {
00052     int pagesRemaining;
00053     
00054     /* synchronize this function */
00055     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(epp->nextPageLock);
00056     
00057     pagesRemaining = epp->pagesRemaining(epp);
00058     
00059     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(epp->nextPageLock);
00060     return pagesRemaining;
00061 }
00062 
00063 int EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(int totalRecords, int recordsPerPage)
00064 {
00065     int pagesLeft = totalRecords / recordsPerPage;
00066     if(totalRecords % recordsPerPage > 0) {
00067         ++pagesLeft;
00068     }
00069     return pagesLeft;
00070 }
00071 
00072 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00073 {
00074     return EaglePageProvider_TotalPages(epp->totalRecords - epp->offsetRecords, epp->recordsPerPage);
00075 }
00076 
00077 int EaglePageProvider_pagesRemainingFromFixed_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00078 {
00079     if(epp->offsetRecords > 0) {
00080         return 0;
00081     }
00082     return 1;
00083 }
00084 
00085 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPage(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00086 {
00087     EaglePage *nextPage;
00088     
00089     /* synchronize this function */
00090     EagleSynchronizer_Lock(epp->nextPageLock);
00091     
00092     nextPage = epp->nextPage(epp);
00093     
00094     EagleSynchronizer_Unlock(epp->nextPageLock);
00095     return nextPage;
00096 }
00097 
00098 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromStream_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00099 {
00100     int *begin = (int*) epp->records, *data = NULL;
00101     int pageSize = MIN(epp->recordsPerPage, epp->totalRecords - epp->offsetRecords);
00102     EaglePage *page;
00103     
00104     data = (int*) calloc((size_t) pageSize, sizeof(int));
00105     memmove((void*) data, (const void *) (begin + epp->offsetRecords), (unsigned long) (sizeof(int) * (size_t) pageSize));
00106     
00107     page = EaglePage_New(data, pageSize, epp->offsetRecords);
00108     epp->offsetRecords += pageSize;
00109     
00110     return page;
00111 }
00112 
00113 EaglePage* EaglePageProvider_nextPageFromFixed_(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00114 {
00115     int *begin = (int*) epp->records;
00116     EaglePage *page = EaglePage_New(begin, epp->recordsPerPage, epp->offsetRecords);
00117     epp->offsetRecords += epp->offsetRecords;
00118     return page;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void EaglePageProvider_Delete(EaglePageProvider *epp)
00122 {
00123     EagleLock_Delete(epp->nextPageLock);
00124     free(epp->obj);
00125     free(epp->records);
00126     free(epp);
00127 }
